017package org.spongepowered.configurate.reactive;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
020import org.spongepowered.configurate.util.CheckedFunction;
021
022import java.util.concurrent.Executor;
023
024/**
025 * Something that can publish events.
026 * <p>
027 * Each subscriber is responsible for removing itself from this stream, by using the Disposable returned upon
028 * subscription
029 *
030 * @param <V> The type of notification received by subscribers
031 */
032public interface Publisher<V> {
033
034    /**
035     * Subscribe to updates from this Publisher. If this is already closed, the Subscriber will receive an error event
036     * with an IllegalStateException, and the returned {@link Disposable} will be a no-op.
037     *
038     * @param subscriber The listener to register
039     * @return A disposable that can be used to cancel this subscription
040     */
041    Disposable subscribe(Subscriber<? super V> subscriber);
042
043    /**
044     * Return whether or not this Publisher has any subscribers.
045     * <p>
046     * In a concurrent environment, this value could change from the time of calling.
047     *
048     * @return if there are subscribers
049     */
050    boolean hasSubscribers();
051
052    default <R> Publisher<R> map(CheckedFunction<? super V, ? extends R, TransactionFailedException> mapper) {
053        return new ProcessorMapped<>(mapper, this);
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Return a publisher that will track its most recent value. The provided processor won't have a value until one is
058     * submitted to its owning publisher.
059     *
060     * @return A publisher based on this one
061     */
062    default Cached<V> cache() {
063        return cache(null);
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * A cached publisher with an initial value
068     *
069     * @param initialValue The value to
070     * @return The
071     */
072    default Cached<V> cache(@Nullable V initialValue) {
073        return new PublisherCached<>(this, initialValue);
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * Get the executor that will be used to handle published
078     *
079     * @return the executor
080     */
081    Executor getExecutor();
082
083    /**
084     * A publisher that caches the last value received
085     *
086     * @param <V> value type
087     */
088    interface Cached<V> extends Publisher<V> {
089        V get();
090
091        void submit(V value);
092    }
093}
